item.title: My Interests
item.description: These are some unstructured notes about my interests and where I want to grow.

item.title: 💡 Ideas
item.description: Here is my little notebook of ideas I should probably give a try. 💡 Record processes in Activity Monitor for idle system on MacOS

item.title: 📖🔍 Resources and References
item.description: Here is a list of different resources (books, blogs, podcasts etc) for different topics. A keep some notes about each of them, as to how helpful and relevant these have been for me.

item.title: Useful Hacks
item.description: 🛠 How to connect an old HP (LaserJet 1018) to MacBook? ✍️ https://support.apple.com/kb/dl907?locale=en_US. This solution only worked for older OS.

item.title: 🗒 Staying Fit
item.description: Some skills need to be kept fit, like the body muscles need regular training. That’s why I’ve prepared a list of exercises I need to perform on a regular basis so that I gain, so to say, a “muscle memory”.

item.title: Hacking the Art of Exploitation
item.description: I’ve been longing to finish Hacking the Art of Exploitation book, but I needed VM for that and this wasn’t very convenient.

item.title: 🧑🏼‍🎨 System Design
item.description: System design is very important for any IT specialist. Software engineers are not the only ones who get frequently asked about this when interviewed in some top IT companies.
